de.tud.cib.bimsage.ontology.reasoner

Class SHACLReasonerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.cib.bimsage.ontology.reasoner.ReasonerManager
      • de.tud.cib.bimsage.ontology.reasoner.SHACLReasonerManager

  • public class SHACLReasonerManager
extends ReasonerManager
    Tool for managing the SHACL reasoning process for an ontology Provides functions for adding SHACL-rulesets to an ontology and reasoning it with an appropriate reasoning engine.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class de.tud.cib.bimsage.ontology.reasoner.ReasonerManager

      • SHACLReasonerManager

    • Method Detail

      • addSHACLRuleset

        public void addSHACLRuleset(java.lang.String shaclURL)
        Adds a shacl ruleset to the list of shacl files, which will be reasoned against the ontology. The reasoning process is started through one of the reasoning functions (e.g. reasonWithJenaReasoner).
        Parameters:
        shaclURL - The URL of the SHACL ruleset file that needs to be added

      • removeSHACLRuleset

        public void removeSHACLRuleset(java.lang.String shaclURL)
        Removes a shacl ruleset from the list of shacl files.
        Parameters:
        shaclURL - The URL of the SHACL ruleset file that needs to be removed

      • reasonWithJenaReasoner

        public org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model reasonWithJenaReasoner()
        Reasons the ontology by applying all shacl rulesets in a jena reasoning engine
        Overrides:
        reasonWithJenaReasoner in class ReasonerManager
        Returns:
        The inference model that contains all reasoned results in a TTL file

      • validateWithReportResource

        public org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Resource validateWithReportResource()
        Validates the ontology by applying all shacl rulesets and returning a validation report as Resource
        Returns:
        Resource that represents the validation report (can be transformed to a RDF model)

      • validateWithValidationReport

        public org.topbraid.shacl.validation.ValidationReport validateWithValidationReport()
        Validates the ontology by applying all shacl rulesets and returning a validation report as Validation Report object
        Returns:
        Validation Report object
